subject: Records and Achievements
Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Goaltender Henrik Lundqvist, who tied the team’s shutouts record and is one win from matching the team victories mark, paid tribute to the men he was eclipsing: Eddie Giacomin and Mike Richter.
snippet: Goaltender Henrik Lundqvist, who tied the team’s shutouts record and is one win from matching the team victories mark, paid tribute to the men he was eclipsing: Eddie Giacomin and Mike Richter.
